entities.name: nearly headless nick
entities.description: A ghost who is a member of the Hogwarts staff. He is described as gliding towards Harry with his head wobbling on his ruff.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story. He is excited to tell Dumbledore that he has secured a memory.

entities.name: bloody baron
entities.description: A character who saw someone arrive and reported it to Nearly Headless Nick.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster of Hogwarts. He is in his office attending to business.

entities.name: fat lady
entities.description: A character who is guarding the corridor and tries to stop Harry from leaving.

entities.name: harry's memory
entities.description: The memory that Harry has secured.

relationships.description: Nearly Headless Nick received information from the Bloody Baron about someone's arrival.
Harry wants to tell Dumbledore that he has secured a memory.
Nearly Headless Nick informs Harry about the Bloody Baron's information.
The Fat Lady tries to stop Harry from leaving.
